attributes.action: Force all UK fuel companies to keep up with the fall in oil prices at the pumps
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As the price of oil has now fallen to $86 a barrel why are the fuel retailer keeping the price high at the pumps??
They kept pace when it went up so they should match it on the way down.
Diesel should be less than a pound at the pumps now not £1.20 as it is still in rural areas.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
